items.title: Trump says US needs to 'own' Greenland to prevent Russia and China from taking it

items.summary_zh: 唐纳德·特朗普总统说,美国需要"拥有"格陵兰来阻止俄罗斯和中国这样做.

items.title: X could face UK ban over deepfakes, minister says

items.summary: Technology Secretary Liz Kendall says she would back regulator Ofcom if it blocks UK access to Elon Musk's social media site X for failing to comply with online safety laws.
items.summary_zh: 科技部长Liz Kendall表示,如果监管者Ofcom因未遵守网络安全法而阻碍英国访问Elon Musk的社交媒体网站X,她会支持监管者Ofcom.

items.title: Video emerges of Minneapolis shooting filmed by ICE agent who opened fire

items.title: EU reaches South America trade deal after 25 years of talks
items.title_zh: 欧盟经过25年的谈判,达成了南美洲的贸易协定
items.summary: The EU has reached a free trade agreement with South American countries, 25 years after talks began and despite opposition from farmers in several European countries.
items.summary_zh: 欧盟在谈判开始后25年,尽管一些欧洲国家的农民反对,但还是同南美洲国家达成了自由贸易协定.

items.title: Iran leader says anti-government protesters are vandals trying to please Trump
items.title_zh: 伊朗领导人说,反政府抗议者是企图取悦特朗普的破坏者。
items.summary: Iran's Supreme Leader Ayatollah Ali Khamenei has called anti-government protesters "troublemakers" and "a bunch of vandals" just trying "to please the president of the US".
items.summary_zh: 伊朗最高领袖阿亚图拉·阿里·哈梅内伊称反政府抗议者为"流氓制造者","一群破坏者",只是试图"取悦美国总统".

items.title: US film stars Meagan Good and Jonathan Majors to become Guinea citizens after DNA tests
items.title_zh: 美国电影明星Meagan Good和Jonathan Majers在DNA测试后成为几内亚公民
items.summary: Husband and wife movie stars Meagan Good and Jonathan Majors have travelled to Guinea, where the US couple are due to be granted citizenship after tracing their ancestry to the West African nation through DNA testing.
items.summary_zh: 夫妻电影明星Meagan Good和Jonathan Majers前往几内亚,

items.title: US seizes fifth oil tanker linked to Venezuela, officials say
items.title_zh: 美国扣押了第五艘与委内瑞拉有联系的油轮,官员说
items.summary: US forces have seized another tanker in the Caribbean Sea, officials say, as the Trump administration continues its efforts to control exports of Venezuelan oil.
items.summary_zh: 官员说,随着特朗普政府继续努力控制委内瑞拉石油的出口,美军已经夺取了加勒比海的另一艘油轮.

items.title: Owner of Swiss ski bar held in custody after deadly New Year's Eve fire
items.title_zh: 瑞士滑雪酒吧主在除夕夜大火后被拘留
items.summary: One of the two co-owners of the Swiss bar where 40 people died in a fire on New Year's Eve has been detained.
items.summary_zh: [永久失效連結] 瑞士酒吧的两名同业主之一被扣押 元旦晚会火灾中40人死亡.

items.title: Trump's grand plan to reshape the world order leaves Europe with a difficult choice to make
items.title_zh: 特朗普重塑世界秩序的宏伟计划 让欧洲难以做出抉择
items.summary: For 80 years, what bound the United States to Europe was a shared commitment to defence and a common set of values: a commitment to defend democracy, human rights and the rule of law.
items.summary_zh: 80年来,美国与欧洲的纽带是共同的防卫承诺和一套共同的价值观:捍卫民主、人权和法治的承诺。

items.title: Trump's warning looms over Iran protests response
items.title_zh: 特朗普的警告在伊朗抗议响应上迫近
items.summary: Tehran has witnessed its largest anti-government demonstrations in decades, as protests swept through dozens of districts across the capital and its wider metropolitan area of nearly 16 million people.
items.summary_zh: 德黑兰目睹了几十年来规模最大的反政府示威活动,抗议活动席卷了首都和首都市区的数十个地区,近1 600万人。

items.title: The musician and the strongman leader - what you need to know about Uganda's election
items.title_zh: 音乐家和强人领袖——你需要了解乌干达大选的情况.
items.summary: As Ugandans go to the polls next week they are faced with a choice of propelling a leader into his fifth decade in power or backing a candidate seeking to capitalise on the desire for change from some quarters.
items.summary_zh: 乌干达人下星期参加投票时,他们面临选择将领导人推入掌权的第五个十年,或支持一名候选人寻求利用某些方面的变革愿望。

items.title: Second night of US protests over ICE shooting of woman in Minneapolis
items.title_zh: 美国抗议ICE在明尼阿波利斯枪击女性的第二晚
items.summary: People took to the streets of Minneapolis and other US cities for a second night to protest against the killing of 37-year-old Renee Nicole Good, who was shot in her car by a US Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE) agent.
items.summary_zh: 民众走上明尼阿波利斯和其他美国城市的街头, 抗议37岁的Renee Nicole Good被美国移民及海关执法特工开枪打死,

items.title: Russia hits Ukraine with rarely used Oreshnik missile in fresh strikes
items.title_zh: 俄罗斯在新打击中很少使用Oreshnik导弹袭击乌克兰
items.summary: Russia has used the Oreshnik ballistic missile as part of a massive overnight strike on Ukraine.
items.summary_zh: 俄罗斯使用"奥雷什尼克"弹道导弹作为对乌克兰进行大规模一夜袭击的一部分.

items.title: Venezuelan government begins releasing political prisoners
items.title_zh: 委内瑞拉政府开始释放政治犯
items.summary: The Venezuelan government has started releasing detainees considered political prisoners by human rights groups, in what officials described as a goodwill gesture.
items.summary_zh: 委内瑞拉政府开始释放被人权团体视为政治犯的囚犯,

items.title: 'He's crazy': BBC speaks to Greenlanders about Trump's threats
items.title_zh: "他疯了":BBC向格陵兰人讲述特朗普的威胁
items.summary: This week, Donald Trump repeated his desire to take over Greenland and make it part of the United States, potentially by using military force.
items.summary_zh: 本周,唐纳德·特朗普(Donald Trump)再次表示希望占领格陵兰并使之成为美国的一部分,可能通过使用军事力量.

items.title: One dead, dozens trapped after giant landfill collapses in Philippines
items.title_zh: 在菲律宾的大型垃圾填埋场倒塌后,
items.summary: A mountain of rubbish collapsed at a landfill in the central Philippines on Thursday, killing a 22-year-old woman and leaving more than 30 people missing, authorities have said.
items.summary_zh: 一群垃圾星期四在菲律宾中部的一个垃圾填埋地倒塌,

items.title: Colombia sees 'real threat' of US military action, president tells BBC
items.title_zh: 哥伦比亚看到美国军事行动的真正威胁,
items.summary: Colombia's President Gustavo Petro has told the BBC that he believes there is now a "real threat" of US military action against Colombia.
items.summary_zh: 哥伦比亚总统古斯塔沃·彼得罗(Gustavo Petro)已经告诉英国广播公司,他认为现在存在着美国对哥伦比亚采取军事行动的"真正威胁".

items.title: Watch: Buildings in Tehran set on fire as demonstrations spread across Iran
items.title_zh: 观察:德黑兰的建筑物在伊朗各地示威时被放火焚烧
items.summary: Footage verified by BBC Persian shows buildings on fire in the Iranian capital, Tehran, as anti-government protests spread across the country .
items.summary_zh: 伊朗首都德黑兰的建筑物着火了,

items.title: 'How do we look Indian?': Student's killing puts spotlight on racism in India
items.title_zh: "印度人看起来怎么样?": 学生被害事件引起印度种族主义的焦点
items.summary: The northern Indian city of Dehradun, located in the Himalayan foothills, was shaken by a violent incident weeks ago.
items.summary_zh: 印度北部城市德赫拉敦位于喜马拉雅山脚山上,几周前被一起暴力事件所震撼.

items.title: Huge anti-government protests in Tehran and other Iranian cities, videos show
items.title_zh: 德黑兰和其他伊朗城市的大规模反政府抗议活动,
items.summary: Huge crowds of protesters have been marching through Iran's capital and other cities, videos show, in what is said to be the largest show of force by opponents of the clerical establishment in years.
items.summary_zh: 大批抗议者在伊朗首都和其他城市游行,

items.title: The secret mission to fly a president's body back home - pilot speaks to the BBC
items.title_zh: 驾驶总统尸体回家的秘密任务——飞行员向英国广播公司讲话
items.summary: Exactly 31 years ago to the day, two Kenyan pilots, Hussein Mohamed Anshuur and Mohamed Adan, received an unexpected visitor at their office at Wilson Airport near the capital, Nairobi.
items.summary_zh: 就在31年前的今天,两名肯尼亚飞行员侯赛因·穆罕默德·安舒尔和穆罕默德·阿丹在首都内罗毕附近的威尔逊机场的办公室接待了一位出人意料的来访者。

items.title: Watch: Eyewitnesses recount deadly ICE shooting
items.title_zh: 观察:目击证人讲述了致命的ICE枪击事件
items.summary: Eyewitnesses recount the moments a deadly ICE shooting unfolded in Minneapolis, Minnesota, describing what led up to the incident and what happened after. Renee Nicole Good, 37, was shot and pronounced dead after being transported to the hospital.
items.summary_zh: 目击者讲述了在明尼苏达州明尼阿波利斯发生的一起致命的ICE枪击事件,描述了导致事件的原因和之后发生的事情. 蕾妮·妮可·古德 37岁被送往医院后被枪决并宣告死亡.

items.title: Video shows moment US immigration agent fatally shoots woman
items.title_zh: 视频显示,片刻 美国移民特工 致命地射杀女性
items.summary: A woman in a car was shot and killed by a US immigration officer on a residential street in Minnesota.
items.summary_zh: 在明尼苏达的一条住宅街上,一辆汽车上的一名妇女被一名美国移民官员开枪打死.

items.title: Tracking the oil tankers seized by the US
items.title_zh: 追踪被美国扣押的油轮
items.summary: BBC Verify has been tracking the Marinera for weeks. Merlyn Thomas has more.
items.summary_zh: BBC的核查 已经追踪Marinera数周了 梅林·托马斯还有更多

items.title: Watch: Trump says Maduro copied his dancing. Did he?
items.title_zh: 央视:特朗普称马杜罗复制了自己的舞蹈. 是吗?
items.summary: In a speech to Republican members of Congress at the Kennedy Center, Trump claimed that former Venezuelan president Nicolas Maduro imitated his dance moves.
items.summary_zh: 特朗普在肯尼迪中心对共和党国会议员的演讲中称,委内瑞拉前总统尼古拉斯·马杜罗模仿了自己的舞蹈动作.
